content:
Hey everyone,
I am looking to convert a FHIR payload to HL7 V2 in order to communicate out to a legacy system, and I am looking for any available tools to make it easier. If possible I am hoping to avoid creating a new custom tool for this use case.
I have found several tools for the other way around, where v2 messages can be upgraded to FHIR, as that's probably a more common use case.
Thanks for any help in advance.
Take a look at the #v2 to FHIR stream
